amendment.description: Page 2, after line 17, insert the following: (c) CONSULTATION WITH TAXPAYER ADVOCATE.--In developing the comprehensive customer service strategy pursuant to this section, the Secretary, or the Secretary's delegate, shall consult with the National Taxpayer Advocate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in House Report 114-503 to require the Secretary of the Treasury or the Secretary's delegate to consult with the National Taxpayer Advocate while developing the comprehensive customer service strategy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Sanford.
